text: وَلَقَدْ أَضَلَّ مِنكُمْ جِبِلًّا كَثِيرًا ۖ أَفَلَمْ تَكُونُوا۟ تَعْقِلُونَ

translation.en.sahih: And he had already led astray from among you much of creation, so did you not use reason?
translation.id.indonesian: Sesungguhnya syaitan itu telah menyesatkan sebahagian besar diantaramu, Maka apakah kamu tidak memikirkan?.
